t:
where I stare out into the space, look at the countless stars, and wonder,

          ‘Are we alone in this vast universe?’






I know, I won't get any answer, as I see the two moons shift by.

I close my seven eyes and drift to sleep.
c:
Three of my hands keeps caressing my offspring's glabella.



Nights that don’t let me sleep are often those where I am lost in the world of words, own or others’. #sleeplessnights #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#alone #alien #scifi #universe #life #twist
